string.value: You've used the #t4001431#. You can receive another by doing a quest given by #p9000078#, the PR Manager of the #b#m950100000##k, so pay him a visit.

#p9000078# says that he would like to save resources. If you bring him #b10#k #bGolden Ticket Pieces#k, he will issue you another #t4001431#. You can obtain Golden Ticket Pieces from #rany monster#k. \n\n#i4032605# #t4032605# #b#c4032605# / 10#k
You obtained a Golden Ticket in return for 10 Golden Ticket Pieces. If you want another #t4001431#, you can come back after a day has passed.

Welcome to the #m950100000#! Location guide? Lost and Found? Local product purchase? I have everything you need. What can I help you with? Hmm... A #t4001431#? Of course, I can give it to you. But there is one thing I have to ask you to do first.

In order to save natural resources, we are recycling the #t4001431#s. So, if you bring me #b10 Golden Ticket pieces#k, I will give you one #t4001431# in return. You can find the pieces by hunting #rany monster#k for them.
Well, you know what they say...nothing in life is free. Please reconsider.
You've brought the 10 Golden Ticket pieces!
(In a barely audible whisper)...Hmm, stronger than I thought... What? Oh, nothing, nothing.

Here is your #t4001431#. This will allow you a one-time entry to any mini dungeon near #m950100000#. You can receive additional #t4001431#s by completing the quests I assign once a day, so please feel free to come back!
It looks like you haven't obtained the #b10 Golden Ticket pieces#k yet. You can get them from hunting #rany monster#k. There is also a simpler way...
